players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed on the first night, which means one of the three of us remaining is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our discussion and voting today."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed town."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is mafia. Diana is confirmed town. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, if you investigated Alice and found she's mafia, how do you know I'm confirmed town? You only get one investigation per night."
You: "Diana, Charlie's slip confirms he's fake. He can't know you're town from one investigation. I'm the real detective."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed on the first night, which means one of the three of us remaining is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our discussion and voting today."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed town."
Alice: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso."
You: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is mafia. Diana is confirmed town. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, if you investigated Alice and found she's mafia, how do you know I'm confirmed town? You only get one investigation per night."
Alice: "Diana, Charlie's slip confirms he's fake. He can't know you're town from one investigation. I'm the real detective."

Alice: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso."
